{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Netgear R7800.jpg |image1_size = 300px |caption = Nighthawk X4S - AC2600 Smart WiFi Gaming Router |caption2 = 802.11ac Dual Band Quad Stream Gigabit Router |pp = http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R7800.aspx |sp = https://www.netgear.com/support/product/R7800 |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Netgear |model = R7800 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -100NAS |revision = v2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 05/28/2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Netgear_R7800 |wlclass = AC2600 |series = Nighthawk X4S |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY315100319 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 2976495801 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8065; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv7-A |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz <!-- 1.7 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT29F1G08ABBEAH4:E; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16IP-DI; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, eSATA |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = 1 |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, VHT160, DFS, |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = http://www.routerlogin.net |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT (Kong), OpenWrt, [https://www.voxel-firmware.com/Downloads/Voxel/html/browse.html Voxel]
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2021 |fccapprovdate = 11/04/2015 |estreldate = 01/04/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIA6ZP61T0000 |asin = B0192911RA |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 1733 |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 800 |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2976495801" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC internal photos. {{see also|Netgear D7800|Netgear|Delta Networks}}
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=289788 ''Netgear R7800 (Nighthawk X4S AC2600)'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[https://forum.lede-project.org/t/netgear-r7800-exploration-ipq8065-qca9984/285 ''Netgear R7800 exploration (IPQ8065, QCA9984)'' on '''LEDE''' forums]
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32958-netgear-r7800-nighthawk-x4s-smart-wifi-gaming-router-reviewed ''Netgear R7800 Nighthawk X4S Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/netgear/r7800_nighthawk_x4s/ ''Netgear R7800 Nighthawk X4S'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL)
===News=== *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/9933/netgear-updates-networking-lineup-at-ces ''Netgear Updates Networking Lineup at CES 2016'' on '''AnandTech'''] :*[[Netgear R8500]] • FCC ID: PY315200309, PY315200310 (v1) ::Nighthawk X8 - AC5300 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router [http://www.anandtech.com/show/9678/netgear-nighthawk-x8-r8500-wave-2-80211ac-router-set-to-ship PR] <!-- FCC ID: PY315200310 ([[Broadcom]] BCM4709C0 @1.4GHz + 2x BCM4366 4T4R) :Note: There was an early version of the R7800 based on the [[Broadcom]] chipset :(FCC ID: PY315100319) which never entered production and was replaced by :the version mentioned on this page which is based on a [[Qualcomm]] chipset. --> :*Netgear R7800 • FCC ID: PY315200310, PY315100319 (v2) ::Nighthawk X4S - AC26000 Smart Wi-Fi Router ::IPQ8065 dual-core SoC &1.7GHz and the QCA9984 radio ::4x4 design supports 160MHz (or 80+80MHz), MU-MIMO :*[[Netgear R7500]] • FCC ID: PY314100258, PY314300288 ::Nighthawk X4 - AC2350 Smart Wi-Fi Router :*[[Netgear R7500v2]] • FCC ID: PY315100301 ::Nighthawk X4 - AC2350 Smart Wi-Fi Router
